syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Gravitational potential energy and kinetic energy

learning_objectives.description: derive, using W = Fs, the formula ΔEp = mgΔh for gravitational potential energy changes in a uniform gravitational field
recall and use the formula ΔEp = mgΔh for gravitational potential energy changes in a uniform gravitational field
derive, using the equations of motion, the formula for kinetic energy EK = ½mv²
